column4: can anyone please tell me whats the command to convert vob file to avi ?
I don't believe mencoder can do divx.
if you want a nice frontend for ripping DVDs, you can install acidrip. If you want to do it from the commandline, I'll start reading the manfile.
I thought you wanted to do this from the command line...
I'll use acidrip to generate the command for you, and paste it here.
that's 'cause it's not meant to be an encoding frontend for everything, just dvds
do you want any scaling or cropping?
mencoder input.vob -o output.avi -oac mp3lame -lameopts abr:br=<AUDIORATE> -ovc xvid -xvidencopts bitrate=<VIDEORATE>
replace input.vob, output.avi, and all the bitrates with what you want
try different ones, let it run for 15 seconds, ctrl-c to stop it, then see what it looks like
why are you encoding as xvid? If you're using it on a computer, I'd recommend h.264
it's probably because it's a VOB
I don't know how to deal with VOBs
